meanings.definition: Transported by boat, aircraft, or other means.
meanings.sent1: The ferried passengers enjoyed the scenic boat ride.
meanings.sent2: The ferried goods were safely transported across the river.
meanings.sent3: The ferried ducks quacked happily as they sailed on the pond.
meanings.sent4: The ferried clouds drifted lazily across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The ferried tourists marveled at the breathtaking views from the boat.

meanings.definition: Carried passengers or goods from one place to another.
meanings.sent1: The captain ferried the passengers to the island in his boat.
meanings.sent2: She ferried the groceries home in her car.
meanings.sent3: The friendly dog ferried the stick back to its owner.
meanings.sent4: The wind ferried the kite high up into the sky.
meanings.sent5: The truck ferried the supplies to the remote village.
